mapper.select: select a.* , t2.ProjectName as ProjectIDLinkText, t5.TeamName as TeamIDLinkText, t6.real_name as CreateUserIDLinkText, t7.dict_label as StatusLinkText from ach_appraisal a left join Aud_Project t2 on a.ProjectID = t2.ProjectID left join PM_Team t5 on a.TeamID = t5.TeamID join sys_user t6 on a.CreateUserID = t6.user_id left join (select * from sys_dict_data where dict_type='科技成果状态') t7 on a.Status = t7.dict_value where a.AppraisalID = #{appraisalid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
